授業方法: Face to Face Seminar. Based on weekly readings and class discussions, students will gain a broad understanding of Modern Japan. At the beginning of each class students will present a summary of the assigned readings followed by class discussions that will be supplemented by materials from the instructor, such as newspaper articles, recent statistics and film clips from documentaries and interviews.
